tool_description: Effortlessly manage temporary email accounts and messages with the Temp Mail API. This user-friendly and efficient solution is ideal for applications, websites, or new projects with temporary email services. 📧✨
name: Free TempMail Api
title: Free TempMail Api

api_list.name: 📩 Get All Mail
api_list.description: Get all emails in the temporary mailbox.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-tempmail-api.p.rapidapi.com/mails"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-tempmail-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
